name: Operational Disruption
description: Degree to which the system is resilient to operational disruption and incorporates business continuity measures.

values.name: High Availability
values.description: System designed for high availability and resilience, with real-time monitoring, automated recovery, and regular testing of failover mechanisms.

values.name: Robust Controls
values.description: Robust operational controls, including redundancy, failover mechanisms, and a comprehensive business continuity and disaster recovery plan.

values.name: Some Measures
values.description: Some measures to mitigate operational risks, but no comprehensive business continuity plan.

values.name: High Risk
values.description: High risk of significant operational disruption due to system failures or attacks, no backup systems or recovery plans.
